info.title: UTheme
info.author: Xziip
info.description: All-in-one theme downloader for Wii U
info.details:
A Wii U theme manager and installer with network download support. Download, preview, install and manage Wii U themes directly from your console!

UTheme powered by Themezer API!
Thanks to Themezer for providing the public API; without it, this software wouldn't exist.

Website: https://uthe.me

Features:

Browse & Download Themes - Access themes from online repository
HD Preview - View high-quality theme previews before installing
One-Click Install - Automatic theme patching.
Theme Management - View, update, and uninstall installed themes
Multi-Language Support
Settings - Customize logging, language, and music preferences

If you encounter any issues or have questions:
Check the logs in sd:/wiiu/logs/utheme.log (enable logging in settings)
Open an issue on github.

Support me on ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/xziip

changelog:
v0.3B
This version brings many new features to UTheme!
Special thanks to the community and the dev team for the hard work!

 What's New:

- Multi-language Support: Now supports 13 different languages for a more global experience.

- Search Functionality: Integrated swkbd (Software? Keyboard) support, allowing you to search for themes directly.

- Random Theme: Added a "Random Theme" feature

- StyleMiiU Integration: Full support for StyleMiiU configuration. (Special thanks to @Fangal-Airbag for the implementation!)

- Storage Management: Added SD card remaining space detection to ensure safe installations.

- Safe Theme Saving: Themes are now saved using safe filenames.

- Enhanced UI: Added a touch-screen back button.

- Remote Notifications: Support for remote notification alerts.

- JSON Parser Update: Replaced the simple parser with a more robust implementation for better stability.

- Installation Optimization: Improved the theme installation logic to be faster and more reliable.

 A Note from the Author:
I'm releasing V0.3B today to celebrate the Lunar New Year.

I am aware of the background music (BGM) glitches and some specific library conflicts reported by the team. Since I'll be taking a short break for the holidays, these issues will be addressed in the next version.

Happy New Year to everyone, and enjoy the new UTheme!
